docs.text: Overview Getting Started Snowmass Connect is a job submission service providing access to the Open Science Grid. To sign up, visit https://connect.snowmass21.io/ . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
